review: Doesn't deliver what its advertising claims.  Claims to be easy to set up and use; it's not.  Claims to deliver a world of entertainment; it doesn't.  It only has a select list of movies and TV shows selected by Amazon.  Clunky user interface.  It can't browse the web.  You're much better off just connecting your laptop directly to your TV.
author: Law Prof

review: Just as good as amazon fire tv box. Highly recommend.
author: Pat

review: This was exactly what I needed. It was so quick and easy to set up. I highly recommend.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love,  love, love my Fire TV Stick!!!
author: Susan Heartlight

review: Mine doesn't work at all. Tried 3 sets of batteries  and it doesn't turn on.

review: No It did not run my favorite apps
author: Adel Ibrahim

review: Very cool and easy to use! Only reason I went with 4 outta 5 stars is for being a compact stick, you still have to run an extra wire and plug it into a wall.
author: P. Ruzzo III "PR3"
